abstract.text: An item in a tab view.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: is a convenient way for presenting information in multiple pages. A tab view is usually distinguished by a row of tabs that give the visual appearance of folder tabs. When the user clicks a tab, the tab view displays a view page provided by your application. A tab view keeps a zero-based array of tab view items, one for each tab in the view.

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
A multipage interface that displays one page at a time.
A container view controller that manages a tab view interface, which organizes multiple pages of content but displays only one page at a time.
An item in a tab view.
